home.my_portfolio.empty: You have no Portfolios; click Create Portfolio to begin. If you would like to use a sample input dataset to start, you may download one from the File Preparation and Interpretation > Sample Input section of the Knowledge Base.
home.shared_with_me.empty: It looks like no one has shared a Portfolio with you. Once a teammate shares one, you'll see it listed here.
home.team_portfolios.empty: Your team has not created any Portfolios.
home.create_portfolio.disabled: You do not have rights to create a portfolio. Please speak with your admin if you think this is incorrect.
adaptation.analysis.title: Set your analysis preferences
adaptation.analysis.perils.label: Perils
adaptation.analysis.perils.description: Select the perils to be included in the Adaptation Opportunities analysis
adaptation.analysis.emissions.label: Emissions Scenario
adaptation.analysis.emissions.descriptio: The Adaptation Opportunities modules calculates avoided loss and ROI metrics for a single emissions scenario at a time
adaptation.analysis.interruptions.label: Include business Interruptions in loss and ROI calculations?
adaptation.analysis.interruptions.descri: Losses estimated for both direct physical damages as well as business interruption. This setting determines whether losses and downstream ROI metrics should include business interruption or if they should be considered for direct physical damage only.
adaptation.analysis.cost_range.label: Adaptation unit cost range
adaptation.analysis.cost_range.descripti: Adaptation unit costs can vary widely. This setting determines whether to use the low, middle or upper range estimates for adaptation cost and ROI calculations
adaptation.analysis.cost_range.custom_pl: Expressed as a % of estimated costs
adaptation.analysis.horizon.label: Investment Horizon
adaptation.analysis.horizon.description: Length of time over which ROI and related metrics should be calculated
adaptation.analysis.discount_rate.label: Discount Rate
adaptation.analysis.discount_rate.descri: The discount rate is used to calculate the present value of future cash flows in the ROI analysis. By default, no discount rate is applied. To leverage asset-level specific discount rates either provided in the input portfolio file or estimated by Jupiter based on industry and geographic region, select “asset-level discount rates”. The range displayed next to this option is the range of asset-level discount rates for this portfolio. To apply a portfolio-wide custom discount rate, select custom and then enter the desired discount rate.
adaptation.analysis.discount_rate.custom: Expressed as a % of estimated costs
adaptation.analysis.growth_factor.label: Growth Factor
adaptation.analysis.growth_factor.descri: The growth factor represents the expected annual increase in asset value into the future.By default, no growth factor is applied. To leverage asset-level specific growth factors either provided in the input portfolio file or estimated by Jupiter based on industry and geographic region, select “asset-level growth factors”. The range displayed next to this option is the range of asset-level growth factors for this portfolio. To apply a portfolio-wide custom growth factor, select custom and then enter the desired discount rate
adaptation.analysis.growth_factor.custom: Expressed as a % of estimated costs
adaptation.sidebar.warning.modal.body: {notApplicableCount, plural, =0 {} other {This adaptation strategy cannot be applied to some assets due to conflicting occupancy codes or asset settings. } } {overriddenCount, plural, =0 {} other {Some asset settings were overridden when Adaptation Measures were applied. } } You can adjust individual asset strategies by going to Adaptation Measures by Asset.
adaptation.tabs.investment.title: Investment Decision Matrix
adaptation.tabs.investment.label: Adaptation costs powered by
adaptation.tabs.capital.title: Capital Expenditure Timeline
adaptation.tabs.capital.label: Annual Capital Expenditure
adaptation.recalculating.loader: Your adaptations are being recalculated. This may take a while.
adaptation.sidebar.wildfire.double_pane_: Double Pane Windows With Tempered Glass
adaptation.measure_settings.title: Adaptation Measure Settings
adaptation.measure_settings.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
adaptation.measure_settings.confirm_mess: Are you sure you want to {action} your adaptation measure settings? This will {effect} any changes you have made.
adaptation.measure_settings.success_desc: Your Location-level Adaptation Measure Settings have been applied.
adaptation.charts.aal_progression.title: Average Annual Loss Progression
adaptation.charts.aal_progression_by_per: Average Annual Loss Progression By Peril
adaptation.teaser.title: Coming Soon: Adaptation Insights
adaptation.teaser.subtitle: Your Solutions Architect will be in touch with more information
adaptation.teaser.text: A new module to assess loss reduction, ROI, and the effectiveness of adaptation strategies will be available shortly. Please contact your Solutions Architect for more information.
adaptation.charts.npv.no.label: No Label
adaptation.asset_selection_view.title: Asset Selection View
adaptation.asset_selection_view.by_peril: Average Annual Loss Progression By Peril
create_portfolio.validation_log.no_valid: No validation errors or warnings detected.
create_portfolio.upload_type.label: Upload Type
create_portfolio.upload_type.import_file: Ensure file contains no more than 10,000 locations
create_portfolio.enter_csv.help_text:
The file must have a header row and at least one valid input data row
Format as decimal degrees with at least one non-zero decimal fraction, i.e. "40.7341,-73.9941"
Latitude ranges from -90 to +90 degrees, Longitude ranges from -180 to +180 degrees
Analysis may not be accessible for locations that are far offshore
create_portfolio.enter_lat_long.help_tex: Format as decimal degrees with at least one non-zero decimal fraction, i.e. "40.7341,-73.9941" Latitude ranges from -90 to +90 degrees, Longitude ranges from -180 to +180 degrees.
create_portfolio.enter_address.help_text: Specify addresses in accordance with the format used by the national postal service of the country concerned. Additional address elements such as business names and unit, suite or floor numbers should be avoided.
create_portfolio.location_errors_modal.d: Would you like to fix the following issues or proceed anyways?
create_portfolio.location_errors_modal.c: Rows with warnings will remain in the dataset, while rows with errors will be removed.
create_portfolio.location_errors_modal.n: You would need to fix the following issues to proceed.
No valid rows, or rows with warnings available in the dataset.
create_portfolio.edit_settings.run_adapt: Check this box if you wish to perform an Adaptation Opportunities Analysis on this portfolio. Selecting this value will remove Custom analysis from available Analysis types (right), and will restrict Data Version to 3.3.0 or greater (below).
You must select Data Version 3.3.0 and analysis type peril, scores and Economic Impact to run this analysis type.
create_portfolio.edit_settings.run_discl: Check this box if you wish to download and view the Disclosure Hazards for this portfolio. Selecting this value will remove Custom analysis from available Analysis Types (right), and will restrict Data Version to 3.2.0 or greater (below).
To run this analysis, you must select Data Version 3.2.0, and the analysis type must not be set to Custom.
